name: Tide of Devastation
desc: After a character loses or heals themselves for 40% accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 70% Super Break DMG.
enhanced_desc: After a character loses or heals themselves for 40% accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 105% Super Break DMG.
